mapper.insert: insert into t_exam_main_log (year,month,day,user_id,user_name, department_id, department_name, start_time, end_time, spend_time, status, error_count, create_time) values (#{year},#{month},#{day},#{userId},#{userName},#{departmentId}, #{departmentName}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{spendTime},#{status}, #{errorCount},#{createTime})
